animals.name: Lionfish
animals.description: A lionfish can live from 5 to 15 years. It is native to the Indo-Pacific geographic area.

animals.name: Seahorse
animals.description: A seahorse reside in shallow tropical and temperate salt water throughout the globe.

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.description: A crocodile lives throughout the tropics in Africa, Asia, the Americas and Australia.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.description: A giraffe roams from Central to South Africa.

animals.name: Giant Panda
animals.description: An giant panda can be found in South Central Asia.

animals.name: Lion
animals.description: A lion can be found roaming in Sub-Saharan Africa.

animals.name: Cheetah
animals.description: A cheetah is located in central Iran and southern, eastern and northwestern Africa.

animals.name: Frog
animals.description: A frog can live just about anywhere except extreme cold places.

animals.name: Bald Eagle
animals.description: A bald eagle is native to USA.

animals.name: Camel
animals.description: A camel can be found in the Middle East, Horn of Africa, Central Asia, northwest China, and Mongolia.

animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: A zebra is located in eastern and southern Africa.

animals.name: Fox
animals.description: A fox can be found in most continents.

animals.name: Gorilla
animals.description: A gorilla can be found in Sub-Saharan Africa.
